example.name: transitive
example.text: Finally , [*-1] flouting the BPCA 's wishes to continue the popular two-mile riverside Esplanade , prized for its expansive views of New York Harbor , the Statue of Liberty and Ellis Island , [Ms. Bartlett]-1 threw up yet another wall , this time concrete , this time 10 1\/2 feet tall .
example.arg: the BPCA 's wishes to continue the popular two-mile riverside Esplanade , prized for its expansive views of New York Harbor , the Statue of Liberty and Ellis Island
